price: तुम्हारे लिए इसमें बहुत-से मेवे हैं, जिनसे तुम खाते रहोगे।
arabic: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ كَثِيرَةٞ مِّنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: lakum fīhā fākihatun kathīratun min'hā takulūna
